profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-08-14 17:04:25 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Organized into four series: Playscripts; Playbills; Scrapbooks; Production notes.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Around 2003, this artificial collection was created out of material originally found in boxes containing Arthur W. Row papers, the Max Tennis collection, the Henry Y. Porter papers and the Scrapbook collection. Most of the material was well labeled with Fowle's name making it easy to identify.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains mostly programs and published and unpublished playscripts from amateur productions that Fowle was involved with in the greater Boston area. It also includes a series of scrapbooks from productions in the Boston area from 1883-1930.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Frank E. Fowle was director of amateur theatricals in the greater Boston area especially between 1915-35.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains published play-scripts from the late nineteenth to early twentieth century. An inventory book of these plays exits in the series. It also includes a number of adapted, typed play-scripts used by Fowle in productions he was involved with.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Mostly re-typed and adapted plays which Fowle directed or produced.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Two books with Fowle's handwritten notes, one a catalogue of plays found in his collection (see boxes 22-24) and one lists, by actor, where clippings can be found in his scrapbook collection (see boxes 1-19).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains playbills from amateur productions that Fowle directed or was involved with in the Boston area, mostly Malden and Winchester.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged chronologically by year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains Fowle's hand written and typewritten notes on productions he worked on including notes on costumes, blocking, props lists, scene break downs, and character break downs.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged as found.
